NewUserMessageModal.DirectMessage.Info:
Unlike groups users can't be added or removed later
A separate encryption action for each user required
Limit of 4 accounts (Usually just two)
NewUserMessageModal.CreateGroup.Info: Inviting a user to a group gives them the Secret Group Key. This key is used to encrypt/decrypt all messages.
NewUserMessageModal.DoNotStore.Info: Group key will not be stored. You will be requested to enter it before accessing the group.
NewUserMessageModal.StoreLocal.Info:
The group key will be stored in this browser on this device encrypted by keychain.
 On another browser or device you will be requested to enter the group key again.
NewUserMessageModal.StorePreferences.Inf: Store group private key in public user preferences encrypted by kechain.
NewUserMessageModal.IconOpenLock.Info: Enter at least 16 characters or a new private key.
NewUserMessageModal.IconLock.Info: The hashed contents will be used to create a group public and private keys.
